mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_MCT_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT A.MCT_STD_ITEM_ID AS mctStdItemId ,C.MCT_STD_ITEM_NAME AS mctStdItemName ,A.MCT_OK_VAL AS okVal ,A.MCT_NG_VAL AS ngVal FROM PD_MCT_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_MCT_STD_ITEM C ON A.MCT_STD_ITEM_ID = C.MCT_STD_ITEM_ID WHERE A.STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId} ORDER BY A.MCT_STD_ITEM_ID
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID)) FROM PD_MCT_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID

SELECT DISTINCT(B.STANDARD_ID) AS standardId ,A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode ,A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode ,A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode ,NULLIF(A.FEATURE_CODE,'') AS featureCode FROM PD_MCT_STD B LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD A ON A.STANDARD_ID = B.STANDARD_ID ORDER BY B.STANDARD_ID
LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageCount}
